A treatise of death, the last enemy to be destroyed shewing wherein its enmity consisteth and how it is destroyed : part of it was preached at the funerals [sic] of Elizabeth, the late wife of Mr. Joseph Baker ... / by Rich. Baxter ; with some few passages of the life of the said Mrs. Baker observed. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
[2], 49, [7], 250, [15] p.
Printed by R.W. for Nev. Simmons ... and are to be sold by him ... and by Tho. Johnson ..., London : 1660.
Errata on p. [7] at end of section 1. Advertisements on p. [3]-[14] at end of section 2. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
